Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: Updated: 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 25th, Stevenson Expressway, Lake Shore Drive, 18th, Museum Campus and Solidarity Drive.

Northbound buses will operate via McFedridge, Lake Shore Drive, Stevenson Expressway and State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: SB J14 Jeffery Jump, 6 Jackson Park Exp, buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Cermak, King Drive, 47th & Lake Park due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Cermak, King Drive, 47th and Lake Park due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 14th and Indiana due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 14th and Indiana due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with significant delays from O'Hare and Forest Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with significant delays from O'Hare and Forest Park.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line - Limited Service Between Garfield and Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service running with limited service via train shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are operating in two sections:

  • between 63rd/Ashland and Harlem, and,
  • between Garfield and Cottage Grove, with limited service.

Change trains at Garfield for continuing service to/from Cottage Grove.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
